question: What is the cost of the basic plan?
Are there any discounts for annual subscriptions?
Can I change my subscription plan at any time?
reply: Yes, you can upgrade from free to free anytime.

question: Is there a free trial available?
reply: Yes, the free trial continues until I figure out a way to sell this.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
reply: You can cancel your subscription from your account settings at any time. Not sure you would want to do it though.

question: What are the main features of Viroop?
reply: Natural language search, advanced filtering to find the photo you are looking for, fast culling, good keyboard shortcuts.
